channel.title: Insite: General Site Stuff.
channel.description: Anything relating to this site or the unreal community.

item.title: The Future of Insite
item.author: invalid@example.com (Manticore)
item.dc:creator: Manticore
item.content:encoded:
The Future of Insite
posted by T2A`, at: 19:02:47, Monday 14th April 2008

Any readers of BuF should be aware that I do not enjoy UT3 and never enjoyed it at any period over the months I had it installed. I kept hoping Epic would patch it up quickly and its issues would subside and the game would be great fun, but that never happened. I recently uninstalled the game and unless Epic can fix it up I will not reinstall.

So, let's get to the point: I am resigning from Insite. It's...
Click to expand...
The Future of Insite

item.title: Would you like to play the 2k4 team gamemodes with good players?
item.author: invalid@example.com (scirmast)
item.dc:creator: scirmast
item.content:encoded:
Would you like to play the UT2k4 team gamemodes with good players?

I stumbled upon this in the Beyond Unreal UT2k4 forum, and absolutely had to post here to spread the word! UT2k4 is not dead at all! A guy named Motig has started Ut2004 Rebirth, a working pickup channel and ladders for all UT2k4 gamemodes, every day we play different game mode. Gameservers are hosted in northern Europe.

Currently the pickup schedule is:
Mon: Assault
Tue: NW Bombing Run
Wed: Classic Domination...

Would you like to play the 2k4 team gamemodes with good players?

item.title: Read Only
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chrysaor)
item.dc:creator: Chrysaor
item.content:encoded: Why can't I leave comments? I had to reregister for some reason as well.

item.title: Review queue for deletion
item.author: invalid@example.com (T2A`)
item.dc:creator: T2A`
item.content:encoded: If you haven't taken a look at the home page yet and are a map author with a map in our queue, do so. We will be clearing out the queue in a week's time unless you email me. Anyone who doesn't will have their review(s) deleted and will have to resubmit at a later date.

item.title: This site dead?
item.author: invalid@example.com (cUnNiNg_StUnTs)
item.dc:creator: cUnNiNg_StUnTs
item.content:encoded: No reviews, is it lack of maps in the community? Are the reviewers on vacation? What gives?

item.title: [Volunteer] Queue Seems Backlogged...
item.author: invalid@example.com (W0RF)
item.dc:creator: W0RF
item.content:encoded:
... could you guys use a hand with reviews? I feel comfortable enough with the new engine to speak on 200X maps, particularly of the AS and ONS variety.

With my two jobs and with the FragBU video project about to get underway soon, I've got a pretty full plate, but I could make some time to crank out a few reviews too.

item.title: released v0.1 of my mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (T2A`)
item.dc:creator: T2A`
item.content:encoded:
http://forums.beyondunreal.com/showthread.php?t=142269

I'm thinking about posting it in the BU general UT200x part because it doesn't look like too many people use the Released Modifications part yet.

item.title: insite guys still alive or what?
item.author: invalid@example.com (quillion)
item.dc:creator: quillion
item.content:encoded:
lo

your reviews aren't moving at all lately, whats up?
it seems every ut map review site is dead atm.

come on guys people are waiting on you for reviews

item.title: Atari forums screwed up?$#@%#@%???
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded: Anyone know who I contact over there to report a problem with logging in? I tried the webmaster with no e-mail response over the last 3 days. All I did was change my e-mail address from planetunreal to beyondunreal and I can't login on any computer that is setup to automatically log me in nor can I access my UserCP page. I tried clearing cookies and no luck either.

item.title: Congrats Homeslice
item.author: invalid@example.com (Thunderstrike)
item.dc:creator: Thunderstrike
item.content:encoded: I just thought we could start a thread for people to congratulate HS on his recent completion of 200 reviews. That's a big stack of mappage to cover! I know there are some people who have reviewed more maps over on other review sites, but HS is just cranking them through. Well done! :tup:

item.title: Where *is* insite??!
item.author: invalid@example.com (lophead)
item.dc:creator: lophead
item.content:encoded:
Id just thought Id clear something up. If youve come straight from the BU forums and have never been to the site you can find it at:

http://www.planetunreal.com/insite

Bookmark it!

item.title: UT2K4 Patch 2 IS OUT!

item.dc:creator: BobTheDog
item.content:encoded:
Here's a link: FilePlanet Download

Here's the scoop:

========================================================================
Unreal Tournament 2004 Patch 2 Release notes.
========================================================================

This patch is completely compatible with the retail version - servers and clients of any flavor can connect with each other.
This patch will not overwrite...

UT2K4 Patch 2 IS OUT!

item.title: ONS Guidelines for players that s*ck!?
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded: Anyone have any tips for Onslaught playing. I am having a difficult time handling the vehicles and am not sure why. They said the vehicles were supposed to be easy to handle, but it's not happening here.

item.title: Site down
item.author: invalid@example.com (lophead)
item.dc:creator: lophead
item.content:encoded:
The site is currently experiencing some unsheduled down time. The site unfortunately cannot connect to the mysql database.

I'm sorry I can't really give you an expected time this will be fixed, but I'm hoping it will be ASAP.

Thanks for your patience guys.

item.title: Do you find main insite page slow/not responding?
item.author: invalid@example.com (lophead)
item.dc:creator: lophead
item.content:encoded:
Lately when accessing insite I've been infrequently experiencing delays where the site appears not to load at all.

Has anybody else had this trouble? (I just want to make sure it's not just me)

item.title: New insite banner ad (wow!)
item.author: invalid@example.com (lophead)
item.dc:creator: lophead
item.content:encoded: I've just made a new banner ad for insite to go in the GSI banner ad rotation. I thought we probably needed one as there may be a lot of lost souls wandering through GSI websites wondering where to go. Anyway, I've attached the image if you have nothing better to do than to check it out

item.title: Insite Freshmeat 2004 has begun
item.author: invalid@example.com (lophead)
item.dc:creator: lophead
item.content:encoded:
As you may have noticed our review queue has been rather swamped of late. I think it's got something to do with that new game released last month. I dunno. Anyway, in order to quell the growing demand I've decided to accept the mission codenamed: Insite Freshmeat 2004. The objective of this mission is to find some new reviewers.

Some helpful attributes and powers include:
* +1 mapping wisdom
* +1 editor knowledge
* +2 fluent writing style
* +1 time
* -2 pig headed
* +1 decent rig...

Insite Freshmeat 2004 has begun
